definition[0]: a process in which something takes in liquid, gas, or heat
definition[1]: a process in which people or things become part of something larger
example[1]: the absorption of Soviet immigrants into Israel
definition[2]: when you are very interested in something
example[2]: I don’t understand James’ absorption with military history.
definition[3]: when a larger organization takes control of a smaller one
example[3]: The chain’s absorption by its rival will lead to the loss of over 1,000 jobs.
